description: Choose a class: cleric or druid. You learn two cantrips of your choice from that class's spell list. In addition, you choose one 1st-level spell from that same list. You learn that spell and can cast it at its lowest level. Once you cast it, you must finish a long rest before you can cast it in this way again. Your spellcasting ability for these spells depends on the class you chose: Wisdom for cleric or druid.
